refnamediv.refpurpose: Read a portion from a ringbuffer

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [sim, data, NumRead] = ld_read_ringbuf(sim, events, ident_str, datatype, ElementsToRead)

para.para: datatype - ORTD datatype of the ringbuffer (for now only ORTD.DATATYPE_FLOAT)
ElementsToRead (integer) - number of elements to read from the ringbuffer
